intro: Asset Allocation is the diversification of your portfolio amongst asset classes. When your portfolio is diverse, you can ensure a good market return over the long term

subtopics.subheading: What does asset allocation look like?
subtopics.par: You can maximize your returns through asset allocation, where you shift your assets around at the end of each year
list: When stocks go up, generally inflation goes up, gold goes up, but bonds go down
